Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions

How do I get refunds for the mentorship program?

We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the program quality. After 7 days, no refunds are provided.

When do new cohorts start?

New cohorts start every month. The next cohort begins on January 15, 2025. Limited seats available.

What is the program fee?

The complete 6-month mentorship program is priced at ₹35,000, which includes live classes, recordings, tools, and personal mentorship.

Do you provide job placement assistance?

While we don't provide job placement, our program focuses on making you a successful independent trader with consistent profits.

Still have questions? We're here to help!
